TopicTitle: Greetings from a rather cold and damp place in the UK

Articles.Content:
Well hello there everyone!

No messing around, I went straight in at the deep end and purchased the current development of the game! I can't wait to build me a rocket and hopefully get into the modding and forum side of things.

Best Wishes

Michael (tarkatronic).

Welcome to the forums, tarkatronic.

Have fun around here, there is a good and helpful community to be found.

Have fun playing KSP and go blow up some rockets!

Hi tarkatronic, welcome to the community

Lets see, cold and damp, could be anywhere

I'm on the south coast, so I occasionally see a bit of yellow on the horizon, I'm told it's the sun!
